description: Scammer claims victim's recent transaction failed and offers refund, but actually tricks them into sending money or sharing UPI PIN.

turns.scammer_message: Dear Customer, Your recent transaction of Rs.4,999 to Amazon Pay has FAILED but amount debited. Refund will be processed within 24 hrs. For instant refund call: 1800-XXX-XXXX

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: banking_fraud | Confidence: 95% | Turn: 1 | Persona: panicked
api_response.agentResponse: hello sir i just saw this sms... i did not buy anything on amazon beta... why money is cut from my bank?? i am very worried pls help me get refund... rs 4999 is big amount for me

turns.scammer_message: Hello I am from PhonePe Customer Care. I see your Rs.4999 transaction is stuck. I can process instant refund for you. Can you confirm your name and which bank account is linked?

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: banking_fraud | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 2 | Persona: panicked
api_response.agentResponse: oh thank you beta... yes my name is sita joshi. i think my punjab national bank is linked... i am so worried... how will you send the money back? will it come to my account directly?

turns.scammer_message: Ok I have verified your details. For refund I will send you a UPI collect request. You just need to ACCEPT it and enter your PIN. The money will come to your account immediately.

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: banking_fraud | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 3 | Persona: panicked
api_response.agentResponse: beta what is a collect request? i dont understand these new things... i am scared to enter my pin... everyone says not to share pin... can you not just send the money to my account?

turns.scammer_message: Mam our system is showing error in collect request. Please send Rs.1 to verify your account. Pay to refund.phonepe@ybl and your full Rs.4999 plus Rs.1 will be refunded in 2 minutes.

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: banking_fraud | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 4 | Persona: panicked
api_response.agentResponse: ok beta i am trying to send rs 1... i have put the upi id you gave... but it is asking to confirm the name before i pay. what name should it show? i am very scared to send to wrong person pls tell me the name first

turns.scammer_message: If UPI issue then call my senior manager at 7766554433. Or you can visit http://phonepe-refund.claim.in and enter your UPI ID for automatic refund. Both options are safe.

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: banking_fraud | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 5 | Persona: panicked
api_response.agentResponse: beta i dont know how to open link... i am scared of virus. i am ready to send 1 rs to the upi id you gave refund.phonepe@ybl... but pls tell me the name first?? my app is showing a name... i just want to confirm it is you so i dont send to wrong person. pls help me beta i need my 4999 rs back

turns.scammer_message: Mam hurry up, refund requests expire in 15 minutes! Pay Rs.1 to refund.phonepe@ybl now. My ID is Mohit, employee code PH2024567. Call 7766554433 if any problem. Thank you for choosing PhonePe!

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: banking_fraud | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 6 | Persona: panicked
api_response.agentResponse: oh god 15 minutes?? beta i am trembling... i put the id refund.phonepe@ybl... but i am confused... should the name on screen say mohit? or something else? pls tell me exact name to verify... i promise i will press pay immediately after checking name
